project.name: |-- 001-basic-inheritance
project.description:
Keywords: + Inheritance + Constructor calls sequence + Final methods + super keyword
This project includes very simple examples involving inheritance concepts.
InheritanceConstructorCalls: Demonstrates how the compiler silently inserts a call to the no-args constructor of the base class. It also shows how you can call any base class constructor.
FinalMethods: Demonstrates how to prevent a given method to be overridden by using the final keyword on the method declaration.
CallingOverriddenMembers: Demonstrates how to use the super keyword to call base class members.
GenericClassTest: Demonstrates how to write Generic classes to facilitate the creation of implementation classes that conform to a given interface that provide several methods.
